thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Paypoint Says FY Outlook Remains In Line With Previous Guidance​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Paypoint Says FY Outlook Remains In Line With Previous Guidance​
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Paypoint Plc:
* ‍GROUP LIKE-FOR-LIKE(2) NET REVENUE GREW 3.6% TO £31.8 MILLION FOR THE THREE MONTHS ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* ‍UK RETAIL SERVICES LIKE-FOR-LIKE(2) NET REVENUE GREW BY 4.6% DRIVEN BY PAYPOINT ONE FOR THE THREE MONTHS ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* ‍FULL YEAR OUTLOOK REMAINS IN LINE WITH PREVIOUS GUIDANCE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
